channel.title: ABA Catabolism on funPlantGenes
channel.description: Recent content in ABA Catabolism on funPlantGenes

item.title: CsAGL16
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: CsaV3_3G048150 Gene Symbol: CsAGL16 Gene Name: AGAMOUS-LIKE 16 Genome: Cucurbitaceae genome database Species: Cucumis sativus Functional Descriptions: The AGAMOUS-LIKE 16–GENERAL REGULATORY FACTOR 1 module regulates axillary bud outgrowth via catabolism of abscisic acid in cucumber.

item.title: GmCYP707A1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GmCYP707A1 Gene Name: abscisic acid 8’-hydroxylase Genome: Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: GmCYP707A1, which is a key ABA 8′-hydroxylase that functions in ABA catabolism.

item.title: LeNCED1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: LeNCED1 Gene Name: 9-cis-epoxy-carotenoid dioxygenase Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: Abscisic acid levels in tomato ovaries are regulated by LeNCED1 and SlCYP707A1.

item.title: OsABA8ox2;OsCYP707A6
item.description: Gene Details: MSU gene ID: LOC_Os08g36860 RAPdb gene ID: Os08g0472800 Gene Symbol: OsABA8ox2 OsCYP707A6 Gene Name: Genome: MSU7 , IRGSP-1.

item.description: Gene Details: MSU gene ID: LOC_Os03g48540 RAPdb gene ID: Os03g0691800 Gene Symbol: OsHIPL1 Gene Name: Genome: MSU7 , IRGSP-1.

item.title: OsLTPL23
item.description: Gene Details: MSU gene ID: LOC_Os12g02290 RAPdb gene ID: Os12g0114500 Gene Symbol: OsLTPL23 Gene Name: Genome: MSU7 , IRGSP-1.

item.title: OsSPL14;IPA1
item.description: Gene Details: MSU gene ID: LOC_Os08g39890 RAPdb gene ID: Os08g0509600 Gene Symbol: OsSPL14 IPA1 WFP Gene Name: Genome: MSU7 , IRGSP-1.

item.title: OsTPP1
item.description: Gene Details: MSU gene ID: LOC_Os02g44230 RAPdb gene ID: Os02g0661100 Gene Symbol: OsTPP1 Gene Name: Genome: MSU7 , IRGSP-1.

item.title: PacCYP707A1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: PacCYP707A1 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Prunus avium Functional Descriptions: PacCYP707A2 negatively regulates cherry fruit ripening while PacCYP707A1 mediates drought tolerance.

item.title: PacCYP707A2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: PacCYP707A2 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Prunus avium Functional Descriptions: PacCYP707A2 negatively regulates cherry fruit ripening while PacCYP707A1 mediates drought tolerance.

item.title: PpyABF3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: PpyABF3 Gene Name: ABRE-BINDING FACTOR3 Genome: Species: Prunus persica Functional Descriptions: PpyABF3 recruits the COMPASS-like complex to regulate bud dormancy maintenance via integrating ABA signaling and GA catabolism.

item.title: PrCYP707A1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: PrCYP707A1 Gene Name: ABA 8’-hydroxylase CYP707A1 Genome: Species: Phelipanche ramosa Functional Descriptions: PrCYP707A1, an ABA catabolic gene, is a key component of Phelipanche ramosa seed germination in response to the strigolactone analogue GR24.

item.title: PrCYP707A2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: PrCYP707A2 Gene Name: ABA 8’-hydroxylase CYP707A2 Genome: Species: Phelipanche ramosa Functional Descriptions: PrCYP707A1, an ABA catabolic gene, is a key component of Phelipanche ramosa seed germination in response to the strigolactone analogue GR24.

item.title: SD6
item.description: Gene Details: MSU gene ID: LOC_Os06g06900 RAPdb gene ID: Os06g0164400 Gene Symbol: SD6 Gene Name: Genome: MSU7 , IRGSP-1.

item.title: SlCYP707A1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: SlCYP707A1 Gene Name: Abscisic acid 8’-hydroxylase CYP707A1 Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: Abscisic acid levels in tomato ovaries are regulated by LeNCED1 and SlCYP707A1.

item.title: SlCYP707A2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: SlCYP707A2 Gene Name: abscisic acid 8’-hydroxylase CYP707A2 Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: SlNCED1 and SlCYP707A2: key genes involved in ABA metabolism during tomato fruit ripening.

item.title: SlNCED1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: SlNCED1 Gene Name: 9-cis-epoxycarotenoid dioxygenase Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: SlNCED1 and SlCYP707A2: key genes involved in ABA metabolism during tomato fruit ripening.

item.title: SlUGT75C1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Solyc09g092500 Gene Symbol: SlUGT75C1 Gene Name: UDP-glycosyltransferase 75C1 Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: SlUGT75C1 catalyzes the glucosylation of both ABA and IAA in vitro| SlUGT76E1 can only catalyze the conjugation of ABA| and SlUGT73C4 cannot glycosylate either ABA or IAA.

item.title: ZmAbh4
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Zm00001eb314900 Gene Symbol: ZmAbh4 Gene Name: abscisic acid 8’-hydroxylase4 Genome: Zm-B73-REFERENCE-NAM-5.
